schema.description: 您的加速域名，多个域名使用半角逗号（,）分隔，一次最多支持50个域名查询。
功能配置ID，多个ID用半角逗号（,）分隔。ConfigId查询和使用，请参见[ConfigId使用说明](~~388994~~)。

400.errorMessage: You cannot delete all gary configurations. You can clear them by rolling back the simulation environment.
The number of rules exceeds the default limit (1). To increase the limit, submit a ticket.
The extension has a background configuration or a parameter of this configuration is invalid. For more information, submit a ticket.
A background customization rule exists or a parameter of this configuration is invalid. For more information, submit a ticket.
JavaScript rules are not supported. For more information, submit a ticket.

title: 删除模拟环境指定配置
summary: 调用DeleteSpecificStagingConfig删除模拟环境中的指定配置。
